text: Anɨb agelak, gapman bɨawl Peliks ne Pol nop agek apek, bɨ takaw adɨk madɨk gɨl agñeb Tetulus, ne Pol nop puŋɨlɨl jɨmñɨl lɨl gapman bɨawl nop agñak, Bɨawl Peliks. Nad chɨnop kod mɨdɨl agek, chɨn mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨpun agak. Penpen ma gɨpun, teplep mɨdobun agak. Gos nad teplep mɨdeb ak nɨŋɨd ge, tap tɨmel bɨlel golɨgup ak mɨñɨl ma mɨdeb agak.
